TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AnonymousIdentificationSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class AnonymousIdentificationSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 設定未驗證之使用者的匿名識別。

span.span: Configures anonymous identification for users that are not authenticated.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可讓您以程式設計方式存取和修改`anonymousIdentification`組態檔元素。The class allows you to programmatically access and modify the `anonymousIdentification` element of a configuration file. 匿名識別的目的是要指派，請在電腦和應用程式層級，未經驗證的使用者的唯一識別。The purpose of anonymous identification is to assign, at machine and application level, a unique identity to a non-authenticated user. 這個識別可用來追蹤使用者。This unique identity can then be used to track the user. 匿名識別使用此內容中沒有任何關聯性與 Web 要求的簽發者的身分或與使用者; 相關的其他安全性方面它只會指派的唯一識別追蹤用途，而且使用者狀態管理。Anonymous identification as used in this context does not have any relationship with the identity of the issuer of the Web request or with other security aspects related to the user; it simply assigns a unique identity for tracking purposes and user state management. 匿名使用者通常使用來追蹤`Session`識別項。Anonymous users are often tracked using the `Session` identifier. 使用這個方法主要的問題在於不唯一識別碼和相關儲存設定資料的負擔`Session`狀態值，必須完成才能指派給使用者的工作階段識別項。The main problems with this approach are the non-uniqueness of the identifier and the overhead involved in storing data to set a `Session` state value, which must be done in order to assign a session identifier to a user. 匿名識別解決這些問題的每個未驗證的使用者提供的唯一識別碼，並不要求使用者儲存任何資料，可設定的識別碼。Anonymous identification resolves these problems by providing a unique identifier for each non-authenticated user and not requiring the user to store any data to set the identifier. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何取得基礎的組態檔中的物件。The following example shows how to obtain the object from the underlying configuration file. 您可以使用此物件來取得或設定相關的組態值。You use this object to get or set the related configuration values. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/CS/AnonymousIdentificationSection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/VB/AnonymousIdentificationSection.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它會呼叫 ASP.NET 組態系統。It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system. 取得執行個體類別使用方法。You obtain an instance of the class by using the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::HttpCookieMode Cookieless { System::Web::HttpCookieMode get(); void set(System::Web::HttpCookieMode value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否使用 Cookie。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use cookies.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會定義何時應該使用 cookie 來維護使用者的相關資訊。The property defines when a cookie should be used to maintain information about the user. 當屬性設定為，使用者的識別碼會儲存在 cookie 中。When the property is set to , the user's identifier is stored in a cookie. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, refer to . > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 會儲存使用者的 URI 路徑內的匿名識別項 （也就是執行在無 cookie 模式） 如果屬性設定為下列值之一： ;當瀏覽器設定檔表示，cookie 不支援; 或自動偵測程序判斷瀏覽器不支援 cookie。ASP.NET stores the user's anonymous identifier within the URI path (that is, it runs in cookieless mode) if the property is set to one of the following values: ; when the browser profile indicates that cookies are not supported; or when the auto-detection process determines that the browser does not support cookies. 最後，如果 URI 及匿名識別項的大小超過允許的長度，不會套用的匿名識別項。Finally, if the size of the URI and the anonymous identifier exceeds the allowed length, the anonymous identifier is not applied. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/CS/AnonymousIdentificationSection.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/VB/AnonymousIdentificationSection.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CookieName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 Cookie 名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the cookie name.
The name of the cookie.
The default value is ".ASPXANONYMOUS".

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 屬性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/CS/AnonymousIdentificationSection.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/VB/AnonymousIdentificationSection.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CookiePath { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定儲存 Cookie 的路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets the path where the cookie is stored.

value.span: 用於使用者匿名識別的 HTTP Cookie 路徑。

span.span: The path of the HTTP cookie to use for the user's anonymous identification.

value.span: 預設值是正斜線 (/)，表示 Web 應用程式的根目錄。

span.span: The default value is a slash (/), which represents the Web application root.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出驗證 cookie 的位於何處，而且會傳送驗證 cookie 本身以及。The property indicates where the authentication cookie resides and is transmitted along with the authentication cookie itself. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 屬性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/CS/AnonymousIdentificationSection.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/VB/AnonymousIdentificationSection.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Security::CookieProtection CookieProtection { System::Web::Security::CookieProtection get(); void set(System::Web::Security::CookieProtection value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用來加密 Cookie 的加密類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the encryption type used to encrypt the cookie.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要改善您的 cookie 保護，您可以也設定屬性`true`。To improve the protection of your cookie, you may want also set the property to `true`. 請務必使用這個屬性的預設值，如果您想要資料驗證和加密來協助保護 cookie。Be sure to use the default value for this property if you want both data validation and encryption to help protect the cookie. 此選項會使用設定的資料驗證演算法，根據項目。This option uses the configured data-validation algorithm, based on the element. 如果可以使用三重 DES (3DES)，且金鑰長度至少是 48 個位元組，則三重 DES (3DES) 會用於加密。Triple-DES (3DES) is used for encryption, if available and if the key is long enough (48 bytes or more). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 屬性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/CS/AnonymousIdentificationSection.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/VB/AnonymousIdentificationSection.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CookieRequireSSL { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出在傳輸驗證資訊時是否需要 Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) 連線。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) connection is required when transmitting authentication information.

value.span: 如果需要 SSL 連接則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if an SSL connection is required; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`true`，除非透過 SSL 連線，則相容的瀏覽器不會傳回的 cookie。If is `true`, a compliant browser does not return the cookie unless the connection is over SSL. > [!NOTE] > 當在 URI 路徑，而不是在 cookie 中，儲存的匿名識別項設定不影響行為的匿名識別模組。When the anonymous identifier is stored within the URI path, rather than in a cookie, the setting does not affect the behavior of the anonymous identification module. 這是與表單驗證中的行為一致。This is consistent with the behavior in forms authentication. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 屬性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/CS/AnonymousIdentificationSection.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/VB/AnonymousIdentificationSection.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CookieSlidingExpiration { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定是否對每個要求重設 Cookie 逾時值。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the cookie time-out value is reset on each request.

value.span: 如果啟用滑動期限則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the sliding expiration is enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設`true`中指定的時間量的單一工作階段期間發出的 cookie 為有效的時間間隔的每個要求會重設、屬性。When is set to `true`, for each request issued during a single session the time interval during which the cookie is valid is reset to the amount of time specified in the property. 當設`false`，cookie 設定點在過期的時間。When is set to `false`, the cookie expires at a set point in time. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 屬性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/CS/AnonymousIdentificationSection.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/VB/AnonymousIdentificationSection.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan CookieTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定驗證到期之前的時間 (以分鐘為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of time, in minutes, after which the authentication expires.

value.span: 驗證到期之前的時間 (以分鐘為單位)。

span.span: The amount of time, in minutes, after which the authentication expires.
The default value is 100000.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以設定這個屬性，任意大的值，但在內部值是限制為兩年的最大值。This property can be set to an arbitrarily large value, but internally the value is limited to a maximum value of two years. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 屬性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/CS/AnonymousIdentificationSection.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/VB/AnonymousIdentificationSection.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Domain { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 Cookie 網域。

span.span: Gets or sets the cookie domain.
The name of the cookie domain.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性允許跨網域具有一般 DNS 命名空間 （例如，所有站台以"contoso.com"結尾） 共用的匿名識別 cookie。This attribute allows sharing of the anonymous identification cookie across domains that have a common DNS namespace (for example, all sites that end in "contoso.com"). 為了讓共用的匿名識別 cookie 必須符合下列需求：The following requirements must be met in order for anonymous identification cookies to be shared: - 想要共用之 cookie 的站台需要有通用的解密和驗證金鑰。Sites that want to share the cookie need to have common decryption and validation keys. - Cookie 路徑等屬性的匿名識別的其他設定，cookie 名稱必須是相同的所有站台。Other anonymous identification configuration attributes such as cookie path and cookie name must be the same for all the sites. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱類別。For more information, refer to the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 屬性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/CS/AnonymousIdentificationSection.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/VB/AnonymousIdentificationSection.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Enabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否啟用匿名識別。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether anonymous identification is enabled.

value.span: 如果啟用匿名識別則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if anonymous identification is enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果設`true`，cookie 用來管理使用者的狀態資訊。If is set to `true`, a cookie is used to manage the user's state information. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 屬性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/CS/AnonymousIdentificationSection.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/VB/AnonymousIdentificationSection.vb#11)]
